question: When did Raj Guru and Bhagat Singh kill Saunders?
explanation: Saunders was killed by Raj Guru and Bhagat Singh on 17th December 1928 to take revenge of the killing of Lala Lajpat Roy. Saunders severely beat Lala Lajpat Roy when he was agitating against the Simon commission. Lala Lajpat Roy died on 17th November 1928.
